title: Defensivist Townie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect someone at night by killing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you kill a target, the following applies to the target:
> - They do not count towards majority, cannot vote, and cannot be voted.
> - They do not influence Factional promotion mechanics.
> - Their role and will is not revealed.
> - They cannot whisper or be whispered.
> - They do not have access to dead chat, but can still talk in day chat.
> - They can still perform any day or night abilities.
> - They are not valid targets for other players, including yourself.
> - They are fully revived at the start of the day after the next night.
- If your target dies to something else the night you kill them, the attributes will still apply.
- You may self target.
